title.narrative: Emergency drought response through provision of integrated water, sanitation and hygiene promotion (WASH) services.

description.narrative: The aim of this $4m IOM project is to improve access to clean water and sanitation for drought-affected communities. IOM will provide water trucking to 190,140 people, construct five boreholes and repair an additional 8 boreholes. IOM will also construct or repair another 25 shallow wells. In addition, IOM will construct 800 latrines serving 24,000 people, distribute 7,500 water and sanitation kits for 45,000 people and share key messages to promote good hygiene practices. In total, IOM aims to reach 190,140 people, including 38,028 women and 66,549 girls.
